## The Ingredients(for 2 persons):


* $250$ g penne
* $125$ g chicken meat
* $1$ onion
* $2$ garlics
* $20$ g butter
* $20$ g parsley
* $2$ paprika
* $2$ tablespoons tomato paste
* $2$ teaspoons of salt, pepper and turmeric
* $3$ tablespoons of olive oil
* $1$ tablespoon cream

## The preparation:

Cut the onions,garlics and paprika, and fry them in olive oil. Then add the meat,tomato paste and 2 teaspoons of salt, pepper and turmic. let them slowly cook. Now you can put the penne in boiling water for 8 minutess, Then roast them in butter and cream and add the parseley. 
finally you can serve your penne with the wonderfull sous and some fresh vegetables.
